about_the_game:
An ancient spaceship became the cage of millions of adventurers who banded together into villages and tribes to survive. One of them, Fleshinsane, has found a magical artifact that allows him to be reborn after death. Fleshinsane must survive and be the first to find a way out of this cursed spaceship.

Infusing biopunk aesthetics into both visuals and gameplay, not being mere set dressing but meaningfully represented by the mechanics themselves.

The game takes place in a living vessel that evolves as you explore and progress through the bowels of the ship.

Key Features

  • Immerse yourself in an atmospheric, mystery-filled world with a deep narrative

  • Assemble a team to safely clear the ship's bowls.

  • Every death has profound significance for both the story and the game world.

  • Explore the endless depths of the decaying ship accompanied by a cinematic soundtrack.

  • Upgrade your base to acquire rare weapons, equipment, and hire new characters.

  • Piece together the mystery of Fleshinsane’s world via flashbacks, voiceovers, and journal entries of its former inhabitants.

Fleshinsane is a gaming experience unlike anything else. It's relaxing yet terrifying. It’s beautiful yet ugly. This is the kind of experience that will stay in your memory for a long time after you finish it.

An ancient spaceship became the cage of millions of adventurers who banded together into villages and tribes to survive. name: Fleshinsane® Forgotten Empire

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: 1.2Ghz+
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256MB
  • Storage: 200 MB available space MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: 2Ghz
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB
  • Storage: 500 MB available space MB available space

short_description: Fleshinsane is a biopunk slasher roguelite, where you explore an ancient spaceship but it's alive, changing and decaying! No checkpoints. Kill, die, upgrade, repeat!
supported_languages:
English*, Russian, Ukrainian, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
